column1: # MACHINE-READABLE DESCRIPTION OF THE COLUMNS IN KNMI UURGEM FILES
# This file should be cheched against the udunits package
# This file can be loaded into Matlab with xls2struct

column8: name (as to appear as netCDF varibale name)
column9: long_name
long_name
char
WMO-number
date
hour
column10: tijd (HH=uur, UT.12 UT=13 MET, 14 MEZT. Uurvak 05 loopt van 04.00 UT tot 5.00 UT / time (HH uur/hour, UT. 12 UT=13 MET, 14 MEZT. Hourly division 05 runs from 04.00 UT to 5.00 UT

column9: Mean wind direction during the 10-minute period preceding the time of observation
Hourly mean wind speed
Mean wind speed during the 10-minute period preceding the time of observation
Maximum wind gust during the hourly division
Temperature at 1.50 m at the time of observation
Minimum temperature at 0.1 m in the preceding 6-hour period
Dew point temperature at 1.50 m at the time of observation
Sunshine duration during the hourly division, calculated from global radiation
Global radiation during the hourly division
Precipitation duration during the hourly division
Hourly precipitation amount
Air pressure reduced to mean sea level, at the time of observation
Horizontal visibility at the time of observation
Cloud cover (in octants), at the time of observation
Relative atmospheric humidity (in percents) at 1.50 m at the time of observation
Present weather code (00-99), description for the hourly division
Indicator present weather code
column10: 1=manned and recorded (using code from visual observations), 2,3=manned and omitted (no significant weather phenomenon to report, not available), 4=automatically recorded (using code from visual observations), 5,6=automatically omitted (no significant weather phenomenon to report, not available), 7=automatically set (using code from automated observations)

column9: Fog
column10: 0=no occurrence, 1=occurred during the preceding hour and/or at the time of observation

column9: Rainfall
column10: 0=no occurrence, 1=occurred during the preceding hour and/or at the time of observation

column9: Snow
column10: 0=no occurrence, 1=occurred during the preceding hour and/or at the time of observation

column9: Thunder
column10: 0=no occurrence, 1=occurred during the preceding hour and/or at the time of observation

column9: Ice formation
column10: 0=no occurrence, 1=occurred during the preceding hour and/or at the time of observation
